Class RenderManager

java.lang.Object
com.um_project_golf.Core.Rendering.RenderManager
public class RenderManager extends Object
The class responsible for rendering the game.

    • renderLight

      public static void renderLight(PointLight[] pointLights, SpotLight[] spotLights, DirectionalLight directionalLight, @NotNull @NotNull ShaderManager shader)
      Renders the light.
      Parameters:
      pointLights - The point lights of the game.
      spotLights - The spotlights of the game.
      directionalLight - The directional light of the game.
      shader - The shader of the game.

    • render

      public void render(Camera camera, SceneManager scene)
      Renders the game.
      Parameters:
      camera - The camera of the game.
      scene - The scene of the game.

    • enableCulling

      public static void enableCulling()
      Enables culling. (Culling is the process of discarding objects that are not visible to the camera.)

    • disableCulling

      public static void disableCulling()
      Disables culling. (Culling is the process of discarding objects that are not visible to the camera.)

    • processEntity

      Processes the entity.

      entity - The entity to process.

      Parameters:
      terrain - The terrain to process.
